list.abs: conclusion Attic type composting latrine is a latrine mode of aerobiotic ferment , which makes pathogen and ascarid eggs of night soil inactivate to attain the requirements of sanitary standard for the non-hazardous treatment of night soil .结论阁楼式堆肥式厕所是好氧发
